admin.rescan.group.subtitle: Will rescan groups
admin.rescan.group.notify: rescan will started at next restart
admin.reloadplugin.title: Restart plugin
admin.reloadplugin.subtitle: Will restart the plugin
admin.permittojoin.label: Accept new hardware
admin.permittojoin.subtitle: Enable/Disable for a period of time the pairing process with Zigate
admin.permittojoin.title: Accept new Hardware
admin.swreset.title: Zigate Soft reset
admin.swreset.subtitle: Will restart Zigate (no lost of paired devices)
admin.erasepdm.title: Erase Zigate
admin.erasepdm.subtitle: Will erase the permanent data memory of Zigate (lost of all paired devices)
admin.erasepdm.alert.title: Erase Zigate, Are you sure ?
admin.erasepdm.alert.subject: ATTENTION, last chance !!!!!
admin.reloadplugin.alert.title: Restart plugin, Are you sure ?
admin.reloadplugin.alert.subject: ATTENTION, last chance !!!!!
dashboard.plugin.update.available: There is an update available for the plugin. Stop the plugin and do a git pull in order to update it.
dashboard.plugin.update.available.title: Plugin update
dashboard.firmware.update.available.titl: A new firmware is available for the Zigate. Available on https://github.com/fairecasoimeme/ZiGate/releases
dashboard.plugin.subtitle: Provides plugin informations
dashboard.stats.subtitle: Provides Zigate statistics in terms of message transmission and reception
dashboard.zigate.subtitle: Provides Zigate informations
dashboard.health.title: Health of plugin
dashboard.trafic.title: Traffic status ( Sent and Receive, Types and  Load)
dashboard.trafic.total.trafic.sent.label: Sent
dashboard.trafic.maxload.label: Load
dashboard.devices.title: Device status (Type, Health and Battery level)
dashboard.devices.label: Devices
dashboard.devices.state.label: Health
dashboard.devices.battery.label: Battery
dashboard.sent.comment: Total number of commands sent. ReTx is the number of Re-Transmission done. This should be 0, but if the plugin is trying to send a command to a powered off device, you can get ReTx
dashboard.received.comment: Total number of messages receive. Cluster is a type of message with information. CRC error should be 0. Otherwise it indicates communication errors
dashboard.load.comment: Zigate load. Peak indicates the max number of message in waiting queue, while current indicate the number of messages currently in the queue
dashboard.devices.comment: Total of devices managed by the plugin. Router is main powered device which participates in the mesh network. End device is a battery based device
dashboard.health.comment: Live: indicates the number of device alive, Not seen last 24h: indicates the number of devices not seen in the last 24hours, unknown: indicates the number of devices in an unknown state. After a plugin restart, all devices are moved to unknown state until a message is received.
dashboard.battery.comment: For devices equiped with a battery, here after is reported the battery status.
device.byname.subtitle: List all HW devices paired with the plugin, and allow you to enter a friendly name for each of them. In addition you get some device informations
group.create.subtitle: Allow edit, create and remove groups, considers that a plugin restart will be required to take the changes into account
group.reloadplugin.alert.title: Plugin Reload
group.reloadplugin.alert.subject: Groups have been updated, plugin need to be restarted
header.popover.title: Restart needed
header.popover.text: Some changes are pending to a plugin restart
network.stats.subtitle: Energy level reports
network.topo.subtitle: List of Network Topology. Select one to get the Mesh diagram
network.topo.visu.subtitle: The Topology diagram shows all links between 2 nodes. If you leave the cursor on a link you'll see the link direction as well as the link quality
network.topo.visu.network.subtitle: Will draw a network graph of your Zigbee environment.
network.topo.device.visu.subtitle: Provides the list of devices managed by Zigate. You'll get also a reference to the Widget names and some other informations from Domoticz
network.topo.device.visu.chart.title: Mesh Diagram
network.topology.req.subtitle: This will trigger a Topology scan, which will be workout in backgroud
network.inter.req.subtitle: An Energy scan report will be provided. It will report energy level between routers and Zigate. In other terms how much power is received by the Zigate. Higher is the number, better it is
network.full.req.subtitle: As for the short energy scan, the report will provide energy level between all routers and Zigate, handling all cross-communications. This will report might take a while when the number of routers is high, n((n-1)/2), for 5 routers it is 10 combinations, for 10 routers 45
network.stats.detail.visu.chart.title: Energy level
setting.subtitle: Allow you to visualize and edit the various plugin settings. Some might required a restart of the plugin to be taken into account
setting.help.legend: Here are all plugin settings that you can update.
setting.subtitle.Services: Enable the services you want to be active
setting.reloadplugin.alert.title: Plugin Reload
setting.reloadplugin.alert.subject: Settings have been updated, plugin need to be restarted
setting.subtitle.DomoticzEnvironment: Setting on how to access Domoticz API
setting.subtitle.DeviceManagement: Here are all settings related to Devices and how Zigate interact with
setting.subtitle.ZigateConfiguration: Here are all settings realted to the Zigate hardware.
setting.subtitle.OverTheAirUpgrade: Here are all settings related to the Over The Air upgrade functionnality.
waitingOTA: delay when starting the OTA process
setting.subtitle.GroupManagement: Here are all setting to enable and configure the Group management feature.
setting.subtitle.PluginConfiguration: Here are all Plugin environements settings
setting.subtitle.DevicePolling: Allow you to specify the polling frequency per type of information. Be aware that a high frequency will load the Zigate and might created some bottleneck
logLQI: Delay before starting a Topology scan (sec)
setting.subtitle.VerboseLogging: Will allow you to enable/disable some Logging features.
